TopicTitle: Long time ksp player - forum noob.

Articles.Content: i dipped back into KSP after KSP2 was released. i never was very active here but id like to change that. any suggestions where i should start? Currently playing a updated interstellar playthrough and i am at early mid game.

Welcome to the forum @NMWXCO.

A good place to start might be posting about your current adventures in a mission report or in this long running thread:
Popular forum activities include posting pics of your craft, writing fictionalized accounts of your missions, and complaining irately about aspects of the game you want changed.

Another popular topic is making a challenge for others to do, except you leave it in KSP Discussion and don't read the challenge rules, attempt it yourself, or even think about it for 3 seconds before posting.
and complaining about the differences from KSP1 to KSP2... i guess

Another thing to do is enjoy the community and have fun.

Welcome to the Forum, looking forward to another familiar face.

On 9/10/2019 at 11:40 PM, Kernel Kraken said:

Another popular topic is making a challenge for others to do, except you leave it in KSP Discussion and don't read the challenge rules, attempt it yourself, or even think about it for 3 seconds before posting.

challenge accepted.

I am great at complaining about things! I am glad to hear that I will fit in here!

Post/reply 4 of 5!
